thread.title: AMAZING! Stay here!
thread.title_full: AMAZING! Stay here! - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sam P
title: AMAZING! Stay here!
text: Stay at this hotel!! The location is ideal the tube station is a 2 minute walk away then a 10 minute ride to central London. Lots of shops nearby and places to eat. Hotel room was immaculate, the staff are the most polite and helpful people I've ever had at a hotel. 100% would stay here again can't fault it in any way.
